From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Cyber Claw:








Cyber Claw snarled at the battle and the blaze of energy weapons in the 
distance. She cowered, ducking her head, and backed behind a boulder. She 
wasn't going to be caught in this. She didn't want to be spotted. Not yet. 
Her plan was to meet up with the Maximals and act more damaged than she was, 
asking for Primal. She wasn't going to blaze in. She had to keep low until 
all of this blew over. She snarled to herself from behind the boulder and 
twitched her tail.
